description:
This bundle was released to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Pokémon franchise, and contains the following:

  • New Nintendo 3DS
  • Pokémon Red and Blue pre-installed on the system
  • Red faceplate featuring Charizard's 1996 artwork
  • Blue faceplate featuring Blastoise's 1996 artwork
  • DLC code for a Pokémon-themed 3DS home screen
title: New Nintendo 3DS: Pokémon 20th Anniversary Bundle (included games)

description:
New Nintendo 2DS LL comes with various pre-installed applications and games which demonstrate the hardware capabilities.

Pre-installed game on the device include:

  • Mii Studio - Not a game per se, but an editor for an avatar character which can be used in Miiverse.
  • Surechigai Mii Hiroba (すれちがいMii広場) - Also known as StreetPass Mii Plaza is a game where player can meet other players over StreetPass and online. By meeting with other players, one can play various minigames available, some free of charge, some not. More available mini-games were released over time.
  • Augmented Reality Games - A selection of mini-games which can be played by using AR cards which came with the device to create augmented reality setting for in-game characters and objects.
  • Kao Shooting (顔シューティング) - Also known as Face Raiders is a singleplayer or multiplayer game where players first take a photo of their face to create a pilot for the helicopter, and then use the handheld as the aiming device around the room in augmented reality to shoot down the flyers.
  • Badge Toreeru Center (バッジとれ～るセンター) - Also known as Nintendo Badge Arcade - A discontinued service which featured a free-to-play mini-game where the player controls the crane and collects various badges which can then be used to customize the menu.
  • Darumeshi Sports Ten (だるめしスポーツ店) - Also known as Rusty's Real Deal Baseball, is a baseball sports demo game which uses in-game purchases to make more mini-games accessible to play.
title: New Nintendo 2DS LL (included games)

description: Love Hero is a vertical shmup where you play as a ship and the goal is not to destroy enemies but to survive the level until time runs out. The video game is known for its bizarre, artistic, and sensual take on the shmup genre. Every level completed unlocks a medical image that clues the user the social and psychological backstory of the character.
title: Love Hero
